alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Natchitoches; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 02 at 4:42PM CST until January 02 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North Central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 745 PM CST. * At 442 PM CST, the public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in near Campti. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Natchitoches, Campti, Ashland, Powhatan, Black Lake, Creston, Chestnut and Grand Ecore. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
